[‚Üê Back to commands index](./)

Allows you to purchase items.

**Usage**

- `/buy name:<string> [quantity:<string>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `name` | `string` | Yes | The item you want to buy. | - |
| `quantity` | `string` | No | The quantity you want to buy (optional). | - |
